title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 23, 2011

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE: 

	Steven R. Frank, of Pennsylvania, to be United States Marshal for the Western District of Pennsylvania for the term of four years, vice Thomas M. Fitzgerald, term expired.

	Jennifer Guerin Zipps, of Arizona, to be United States District Judge for the District of Arizona, vice John M. Roll, deceased.

	Rosemary MÃ¡rquez, of Arizona, to be United States District Judge for the District of Arizona, vice Frank R. Zapata, retired.

	Martin J. Pane, of Pennsylvania, to be United States Marshal for the Middle District of Pennsylvania for the term of four years, vice Michael Robert Regan, term expired.

	David Blake Webb, of Pennsylvania, to be United States Marshal for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania for the term of four years, vice Gary Edward Shovlin, resigned.
